hanzi-su-wiki:
販

Значения

Торговля; продажа

Мнемоника

Коммерция, оборот 反 денег 貝.

Варианты

贩

fàn
to deal in; to buy and sell; to trade in; to retail; to peddle
иметь дело; покупать и продавать; торговать; в розницу; торговать

(Simplified: 贩)
Pictophonetic: 反 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
販毒 [ fàn dú ]: to traffic narcotics; drugs trade; opium trade
販賣 [ fàn mài ]: to sell; to peddle; to traffic
販子 [ fàn zǐ ]: child trafficking

heisig_chinese_memo: It's against the law but many people make a lot of shells being drug peddlers (traffickers).
heisig_constituent: marketing, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, anti-, demonstration, cliff, crotch
koohiiStory1: The goal of marketing is to get people who are naturally anti-buying to spend their shells (money).
koohiiStory2: 『MARKETING: MONEY, ANTI』 The wide presence of MARKETING in our society has led people to become ANTI-MONEY.
jp_example_words: 販売(はんばい): sale, selling, marketing
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: If you're anti-shellfish, then you won't mind if I sell them all. You don't want them in your house anyway!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: if you're serious about being anti-shellfish then you should sell all the ones you have, or let me do it at least.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: I'm going to sell all of our shellfish to Han (はん) Solo. He isn't anti-shellfish like you, he knows how to turn a profit too!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture me (hi) selling all of your shellfish to Han Solo as you stand there with your arms crossed. Han just shakes his head at you and continues to toss them onto his space ship.
Ru_Radicals: ハ, 厂 (скала), 又 (опять), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese:
fàn: (глаг) торговать, продавать
fàn: (графема) продавец, торговец
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you're anti (反) the shellfish (貝) so you sell it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Governments fight against peddlers of fake shells (counterfeit bills).
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Bei " to " Anti " sound. The original meaning is to buy and sell goods. "Jade articles. Beibu": "Vendor, buy cheap and sell expensive." Such as "Xunzi. King Domination: "Then the farm divides the land and plows, the Jia divides the goods and sells, the literati and the official divide the duties and listen, and the founding princes divide the land and guard." "Historical Records. The Biography of Lu Buwei: "Lü Buwei is a member of Yangdi. It is also expensive to sell cheap and expensive, and the family is tired.

" Vendor " also refers to merchants who buy and sell goods. "Shuowen": "Vendor, buy cheap and sell expensive. Congbei, echo." Such as "Zhou Li. Local official Situ. Division City: "The morning market, the morning and the city, and the merchants dominate; the evening market, the evening and the city, where husbands and women are the main sellers." "New Tang Book. "The Biography of Li Jifu": "In the country, since Tianbao, the number of soldiers has been more than 800,000, and the rate of those who went to be merchants, Buddhists, and miscellaneous military services was more than 15%.

" Vendor " also expressed betrayal. Such as "Song Book. "The Biography of Shen You": "Although Lu Bu sells monarchs, Li sells friends, Fang Zhisi people, it is not enough to be cool." Wang Fuzhi of the Qing Dynasty, "Reading General Jianlun." "Liang Wudi": "The grass is not removed, and the new cats are not released. Therefore, the Song and Qi monarchs were treacherous and treacherous, and Qi had ministers of self-jing."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Bei " to " Anti " sound. The original meaning is to buy and sell goods.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「反」聲。本義是買賣貨物。《玉篇．貝部》：「販，賤買貴賣。」如《荀子．王霸》：「然後農分田而耕，賈分貨而販，百工分事而勸，士大夫分職而聽，建國諸侯之君分土而守。」《史記．呂不韋列傳》：「呂不韋者，陽翟大賈人也。往來販賤賣貴，家累千金。」

　　「販」也表示買賣貨物的商人。《說文》：「販，買賤賣貴者。从貝，反聲。」如《周禮．地官司徒．司市》：「朝市，朝時而市，商賈為主；夕市，夕時而市，販夫販婦為主。」《新唐書．李吉甫傳》：「又國家自天寶以來，宿兵常八十餘萬，其去為商販、度為佛老、雜入科役者，率十五以上。」

　　「販」還表示背叛出賣。如《宋書．沈攸之傳》：「雖呂布販君，酈寄賣友，方之斯人，未足為酷。」清代王夫之《讀通鑑論．梁武帝》：「宿草不除，新荑不發，故宋、齊鬻君販國之老姦絕，而齊有自靖之臣。」
humanum_short_description: 從「貝」，「反」聲。本義是買賣貨物。

Total strokes: 11; Radical: 貝
Pictophonetic: 反 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.

    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
    • 反 [ fǎn ] reverse, opposite; contrary, anti-

販賣 [ fàn mài ]: to sell; to peddle; to traffic
販子 [ fàn zǐ ]: child trafficking

販売(はんばい): sale, selling, marketing

從「 貝 」，「 反 」聲。本義是買賣貨物。《玉篇．貝部》：「販，賤買貴賣。」如《荀子．王霸》：「然後農分田而耕，賈分貨而販，百工分事而勸，士大夫分職而聽，建國諸侯之君分土而守。」《史記．呂不韋列傳》：「呂不韋者，陽翟大賈人也。往來販賤賣貴，家累千金。」 「 販 」也表示買賣貨物的商人。《說文》：「販，買賤賣貴者。从貝，反聲。」如《周禮．地官司徒．司市》：「朝市，朝時而市，商賈為主；夕市，夕時而市，販夫販婦為主。」《新唐書．李吉甫傳》：「又國家自天寶以來，宿兵常八十餘萬，其去為商販、度為佛老、雜入科役者，率十五以上。」 「 販 」還表示背叛出賣。如《宋書．沈攸之傳》：「雖呂布販君，酈寄賣友，方之斯人，未足為酷。」清代王夫之《讀通鑑論．梁武帝》：「宿草不除，新荑不發，故宋、齊鬻君販國之老姦絕，而齊有自靖之臣。」

King Domination: "Then the farm divides the land and plows, the Jia divides the goods and sells, the literati and the official divide the duties and listen, and the founding princes divide the land and guard." " Vendor" also refers to merchants who buy and sell goods. "Shuowen": "Vendor, buy cheap and sell expensive. Congbei, echo." Such as "Zhou Li. Local official Situ. 販字的基本解释

販
fàn
见“贩”。

販字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fàn］
［《廣韻》方願切，去願，非。］
“反3”的被通假字。“贩1”的繁体字。
(1)贱的买进，然后加价卖出以获利。
(2)卖出货物。
(3)指收买货物。
(4)经商营利的人。多指小商。
(5)叛卖。参见“販君”、“販國”。

販字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　販； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1205第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?方願切，音畈。【說文】買賤賣貴者。【周禮·地官·司市】夕市，夕時而市，販夫販婦爲主。【註】販夫販婦，朝資夕賣。【禮·曲禮】雖負販者，必有尊也。【史記·呂不韋傳】往來販賤賣貴。【集韻】或作?。

販字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
販字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Sell
fàn
See "Vendor".
Sell
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fàn］
["Guang Yun" Fang Yuan cut, go to wish, no. ]
"Anti-3" was passed falsely. Traditional characters for "貨1".
(1) Buy at a low price, then sell at a higher price to make a profit.
(2) Sell goods.
(3) Refers to the purchase of goods.
(4) People who do business for profit. Refers to small business.
(5) Betrayal. See "trafficking the king", "trafficking the country".
Sell

[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　貨; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1205 No. 15
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】? Fang Yuanqie, sound fan. [Said Wen] Those who buy cheap and sell expensive. 【Zhou Ceremony·Local Official·Sishi】Evening market, where the city is at night, where husbands and wives are the main vendors. [Note] Husbands and wives are sold at night and at night. 【Rituals·Courtesy】Although you are a seller, you must have respect. 【Historical Records·Lü Buwei Biography】Traffic is cheap and expensive. [Ji Yun] Or make?.

fàn

Radicals: 貝, 反  (shellfish, anti)
Meaning Mnemonic
If you're anti-shellfish, then you won't mind if I sell them all. You don't want them in your house anyway!
if you're serious about being anti-shellfish then you should sell all the ones you have, or let me do it at least.
Reading Mnemonic
I'm going to sell all of our shellfish to Han (はん) Solo. He isn't anti-shellfish like you, he knows how to turn a profit too!
Picture me (hi) selling all of your shellfish to Han Solo as you stand there with your arms crossed. Han just shakes his head at you and continues to toss them onto his space ship.
